Magnus Carlsen vs Fabiano Caruana
Carlsen - Caruana World Championship Match (2018), rd 9, Nov-21 
English Opening: King's English. Four Knights Variation Fianchetto Lines (A29)

1. c4 e5 2. Nc3 Nf6 3. Nf3 Nc6 4. g3 d5 5. cd5 Nd5 6. Bg2 Bc5 7. O-O O-O 8. d3 Re8 9. Bg5 Nc3 10. bc3 f6 11. Bc1 Be6 12. Bb2 Bb6 13. d4 Bd5 14. Qc2 ed4 15. cd4 Be4 16. Qb3 Bd5 17. Qd1 Bf3 18. Qb3 Kh8 19. Bf3 Nd4 20. Bd4 Qd4 21. e3 Qe5 22. Bb7 Rad8 23. Rad1 Qe7 24. h4 g6 25. h5 gh5 26. Qc4 f5 27. Bf3 h4 28. Rd8 Rd8 29. gh4 Rg8 30. Kh1 Qf6 31. Qf4 Bc5 32. Rg1 Rg1 33. Kg1 Bd6 34. Qa4 f4 35. Qa7 fe3 36. Qe3 Qh4 37. a4 Qf6 38. Bd1 Qe5 39. Qe5 Be5 40. a5 Kg7 41. a6 Bd4 42. Kg2 Kf6 43. f4 Bb6 44. Kf3 h6 45. Ke4 Ba7 46. Bg4 Bg1 47. Kd5 Bb6 48. Kc6 Be3 49. Kb7 Bb6 50. Bh3 Be3 51. Kc6 Bb6 52. Kd5 Ba7 53. Ke4 Bb6 54. Bf1 Ke6 55. Bc4 Kf6 56. Bd3 Ke6
